room_title: Escape room "Tokyo Heist" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: Had an amazing time going through the Tokio Heist! So much fun and mystery, great attention to even the smallest details! I'm excited to check out the other rooms soon.

room_title: Escape room "Tokyo Heist" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: It was a great experience!! I did the Tokyo Heist room. Very cool! Strategic and lots of details and creativity! Loved it! Looking forward to going through the other rooms. Amazing!

room_title: Escape room "Tokyo Heist" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: We had so much fun in the Tokyo Heist room! The difficulty progressed as we moved on. The building is immaculate and well decorated for the theme. We will definitely book again!

room_title: Escape room "Tokyo Heist" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: As I sit here trying to write a review about Portal Escape rooms I am at a loss for words, much like I was most of the room I did. The attention to detail and the use of audio and visual cues are absolutely stunning. My group did the Tokyo Heist and I was in awe the entire time. The puzzles were well thought out, and fun. It was quite a challenge and I loved every minute. I recommend these escape rooms to anyone who enjoys escape rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Tokyo Heist" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: Tokyo Heist was super fun! You can tell they put a lot of thought and effort into this experience... and there's an elevator. Brilliant!
